issues.description: The UML diagram in the problem statement declares the attribute lectureName as type int, but the reference solution defines lectureName as a String (and the toString example treats it as text). This mismatch will confuse students when they follow the UML and try to use String operations.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the UML diagram in the problem statement so that lectureName is declared as String rather than int, matching the intended implementation.
